titles: Considerations moving to a toleration and liberty of conscience with arguments inducing to a cessation of the penal statues against all dissenters whatever, upon the account of religion : occasioned by an excellent discourse upon that subject publish'd by His Grace the Duke of Buckingham / humbly offered to the Parliament at their next sitting at Westminster.
author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.
notes: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
keywords: Buckingham, George Villiers, --  Duke of, 1628-1687. --  Short discourse upon the reasonableness of men's having a religion.
